entries.title: Major update
entries.text:
New Features
- Pyro Metre
- Flame Ability
- Heal Ability
- Player Dashing
- Stamina system
- Custom Cursor
- FULL controller support
- Skip through dialogue option
- Respawn invincibility
- Visual damage on player

Changes / Bug Fixes
- Scientist buffs
- Lucifer buffs and nerfs
- Red Riot buffs
- Camera changes
- Ifa text scaled correctly
- Trigger hitbox changes
- Player no longer dies when Ifa dies due to Geo Shield
- Ghost Bomb now explodes when touching certain objects
- Scientist roll hitbox fixed
- Mouse no longer locks after going to the menu
- Anemo burst now boosts the player horizontally
- Spikes slower
- Ending now works correctly
- Ghost Bomb now affects Lucifer and minions
- Geo Shield visual layer fixed
- Slime King no longer gets stuck on cage
- Scientist animation pixel issues fixed
- Door trigger sound spam fixed
- Attack hitboxes no longer trigger unintended objects
- Ground check fixed
- Screen no longer goes black after Nod-Krai teleport
- Scientist music now stops correctly
- Fade into ocean added
- Options menu no longer appears behind UI
- Mission text from dialogue no longer appears oversized

entries.title: Major update
entries.text:
- Scientist buffs (damage speed, movement speed increase)
- Fixed black screen bug after teleporting to Nod-Krai
- Added end cutscene and credits
- Fixed player collisions
- Added in-game pause menu
- Insane Mode added
- Hardcore Mode and Insane Mode badges
- Skip text for intro cutscene
- Popups fully integrated and fixed
- Ifa changes (he now follows the player if too far)
- Fixed Anemo ability not being granted from Red Riot
- Changed prefab size of Ghost Bomb
- Fixed main menu image size
- Slime King, Scientist and Lucifer now heal on player death
- And more!

entries.title: First release
entries.text: - Fully playable version of Slime Impact 2D
